channel.title: Health and HEV chargers don't animate when empty
channel.description:
I started playing again with the Steam release and could have sworn the Health charger had a little shutter that went down when empty. The HEV also used to close up when empty but that doesn't happen either. The other animations appear to work.
Is this a known issue? I'm on Steam and no mods that would affect that.
Thanks

item.title: Health and HEV chargers don't animate when empty
item.dc:creator: UncarvedWood
item.description:
I have not seen these shutters either and I also remember them from the mod.

I do not know if they were removed or whether this is a bug. I did notice one first aid charger that was already empty with the shutters down.

Read full topic
item.source: Health and HEV chargers don't animate when empty
